insights.insight: 68% of amateur football fans consume content related to nutrition and performance during the season.
insights.soWhat: Opportunity for supplement and sports nutrition brands in activations during the regular season.

insights.insight: Long-distance runners show a peak in engagement with sports technology content 3 weeks before target events.
insights.soWhat: Optimal window for sports-tech brand activations prior to marathons and races.

insights.insight: 52% of fans seek content about recovery and post-match wellness in the following 24 hours.
insights.soWhat: Key moment for wellness and post-exercise recovery brand messages.
